name: Police Dog Catch Criminals Sim
description:
Here we are with a crazy police dog in one of the solitary police chase games having the concept of police vs thief and police dog games with top police chase stirring missions,This game is about police vs robbers. In this game you are the police pursuit trained German shepherd dog. As a police hunting dog your real mission is to chase down the thieves, robbers and criminal who are trying to escape and getting away after breaking into the city and running fast through the streets.
Features:
•Amazing, Interactive 3D City Environment
•Smooth and Easy game play
•Fun Attack Combos
•Variety of Police Dogs
•Awesome Police Dog Training Sessions
